title: Your Shop question
body: there is barely anyone that this would apply to but im going to ask this anyway. I have every skin in the game so this your shop thing is useless for me. I was wondering if there is going to be a second option for the people like me cause i find like im getting nothing every event this is on

replies.body:
How do you own every skin, theres over 300 of them (give or take)?

That's like $2500 minimum
actually give that another 500 there is over 800 skins in the game

What exactly would they do though? The only reason for the shops is to entice people who would not normally purchase skins into buying one because "its a good deal".

You are not the target for this initiative. Stupid people like me who see 70% off and find it hard to resist are.

LMAO, that's fucking sad bro.

Do you have no other hobbies/interests to spend money on?
